§ 31108. Arbitration, compromise, or settlement The Attorney General may arbitrate, compromise, or settle a claim under this chapter if a civil action based on the claim has been commenced. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 6(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1522.)
